QuestData.Title: Charge of the Covenants
QuestData.Description:
Thanks to the efforts of you and other heroes of Azeroth, the covenants have grown strong. But we can no longer afford to wait for the Jailer to make his next move.
The way to the Maw is open. Our forces stand ready.
The covenants await your signal, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rally the covenant forces to go into the Maw.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Bolvar Fordragon in Korthia.
QuestData.RewardText:
The Maw...
Now our true work begins.
